kDesc
A gift to celebrate the second anniversary of PlayStation®Home! [#Legal]
Un petit cadeau pour fêter les deux ans de PlayStation®Home ! [#Legal]
Ein Geschenk zur Feier des zweiten Geburtstags von PlayStation®Home! [#Legal]
Un regalo per festeggiare il secondo anniversario di PlayStation®Home! [#Legal]
Un regalo para celebrar el segundo aniversario de PlayStation®Home. [#Legal]
PS Home의 2주년을 기념하여 Home팀이 작은 선물을 준비하였습니다. 부디 사용해 주세요! [#Legal]
In celebration of the 2nd anniversary, Home team has a small gift to everyone. Please enjoy! [#Legal]
慶祝2週年！這件T恤是Home團隊送給您的一份小禮物，敬請享受吧！ [#Legal]
慶祝2週年！這件T恤是Home團隊送給您的一份小禮物，敬請享受吧！ [#Legal]
A gift for participating in the 2nd Anniversary event! [#Legal]
